author: Oblivionatingstud

text:
I haven't gotten to *this* part just yet, but what I found something quite ironic in the game.  

As it turns out, you don't hear this song on that uninhabited island for the FIRST time in the game!

You can hear this tune play when you re-enter the Pirate Island underground base, after the invasion.  The irony, is that the base is STILL being inhhabited at that time!

Just a heads up if no one spotted this right away.

author: Masz52

text:
I loved this part in the game. I could see this song played in a Dragon Quest game.

On another note, I finished watching the Elfen Lied anime and then reading the manga (I said I would after the video I posted earlier). It was great! I'm probably one of the few though who liked the way the anime ended, I felt like the rest of the story in the manga started to feel a bit too exagerated. I still enjoyed it though.
